txt.en: 'Durin's Way is home to precious few of the artifacts of our ancestors, many of which have been lost or destroyed by the goblins.\n\n'Listein has been searching for these artifacts throughout Durin's Way, in the hopes of preserving the history of our craft. Take this message to him. It reveals the last known location of such an artifact, and I'm sure he will be thankful for it.'

'A message? I was not expecting any messages, what is this about?'

You deliver the message, and Listein looks it over.

'This artifact was not far from here at all! This is wonderful news, [placeholder]. With this information, I may be able to preserve another once lost artifact!'
'The Door to the Clouds is north and a bit east. It is a small outpost at the onset of the frigid Zirakzigil.'
Líkmund has given you a message to bring to Listein at the Door to the Clouds, the entrance to Zirakzigil in Durin's Way.
Talk to Listein at the entrance to Zirakzigil

Listein can be found at the Door to the Clouds, the entrance to Zirakzigil in Durin's Way.\n\nLíkmund has asked you to take a message to Listein that may contain information on the location of a lost artifact in Moria.
